elements.label: 伦敦 [停泊]
elements.description: 首都，曾经我称之为家的地方。如今我已不确定其他的港口是否能代替这个地位。但仍然，勾起了我许多回忆。

elements.label: 阿姆斯特丹 [停泊]
elements.description: A spiderweb of canals lies at the heart of a sea of brick and cobblestone. A jewel of commerce and mercantilism.

elements.label: 阿姆斯特丹

elements.label: 哥本哈根 [停泊]
elements.description: Once it held full control over the passage between the North and East Sea. Those tariffs have built 美丽的 bastion of copper and stone.

elements.label: 阿姆斯特丹下水道 [停泊]
elements.description: However deep we'll delve or far we go, this is our way back to the open sea.

elements.label: 阿姆斯特丹下水道
elements.description: The subterranean hive of tunnels, sewers and waterways beneath Amsterdam.

elements.label: 阿姆斯特丹下水道
elements.description: The subterranean hive of tunnels, sewers and waterways beneath Amsterdam.

elements.label: 沉没之城 [停泊]
elements.description: However deep we'll delve or far we go, this is our way back to the open sea.

elements.label: 沉没之城
elements.description: Sometimes, when the moon is right and the tides are swayed by nostalgia, the sea is opened like a treshold and a swallowed city is laid bare.

elements.label: 沉没之城
elements.description: Sometimes, when the moon is right and the tides are swayed by nostalgia, the sea is opened like a treshold and a swallowed city is laid bare.

elements.label: Eddanger Forest [停泊]
elements.description: However deep we'll delve or far we go, this is our way back to the open sea.

elements.label: Eddanger Forest
elements.description: On the coastline from which ones the vikings sailed, a peculiar little forest lies. Where the surrounding lands have been logged and cleared to farmland, this has remained. Strange stories are told about the creatures that dwell there, and the plants that grow.

elements.label: Eddanger Forest

elements.label: Dockside Warehouse [停泊]
elements.description: However deep we'll delve or far we go, this is our way back to the open sea.

elements.label: Dockside Warehouse
elements.description: Where criminals have access to the sea, strange and valuable things accrue.

elements.label: Dockside Warehouse
elements.description: Where criminals have access to the sea, strange and valuable things accrue.

elements.label: Salvage Mission [停泊]
elements.description: However deep we'll delve or far we go, this is our way back to the open sea.

elements.label: Salvage Mission
elements.description: A shipwreck in some ill-fortuned waters have left sailors abuzz with stories of its cargo. If we can salvage something from the @#mariner.shipnameid|9|Bella Sonata#mariner.shipnameid|8|Vengeful Spirit#mariner.shipnameid|7|Cerberus#mariner.shipnameid|6|Olympic#mariner.shipnameid|5|Ventus Excitor#mariner.shipnameid|4|USS Abraham Lincoln#mariner.shipnameid|3|Chimaera#mariner.shipnameid|2|Dazzler#mariner.shipnameid|1|Hispaniola@, it might be very worth our while.

elements.label: Rescue Mission [停泊]
elements.description: However deep we'll delve or far we go, this is our way back to the open sea.

elements.label: Rescue Mission
elements.description: A shipwreck has been reported recently, and it the company has placed a reward out on who ever can bring back the missing crewmembers, who are stranded, somewhere on an island.
